thread.title: Lynas narrows annual net loss

title: Lynas narrows annual net loss
text:
Mon, Sep 21, 2015, 11:05 AM AEST - Australia Markets close in 4 hrs 55 mins Lynas narrows annual net loss AAP – 40 minutes ago Print 
Rare earths miner Lynas has narrowed its full year net loss to $118.60 million, from $345.40 million in the previous year, helped by cost reductions and higher sales. 
The company mines metals used in many hi-tech products in Western Australia and operates a refinery in Malaysia. 
Lynas achieved sales of $144.6 million in the year to June 30, up from $64.6 million in the previous year, as production more than doubled. @y7finance on Twitter, become a fan on Facebook Budget 14/15 outcome confirms improvement AAP 
In one of his last acts as treasurer, Joe Hockey has released the final budget outcome for the 2014/15 financial … Terms
